title: Lynda.com Flashforward 2007 Animation Tips and Tricks
description:
Flashforward 2007: Animation Tips and Tricks
                with: Chris Georgenes
                Running Time: 1 hour
                Animation Tips and Tricks is a recording of the live presentation 
                given by Chris Georgenes at the Flashforward 2007 conference in Boston. 
                Please note that since this presentation was recorded live, the audio 
                and video quality may vary from our regular course offerings.

                Session Description: Learn how a real full-time freelance Flash                 
                designer and animator meets critical client deadlines on a daily basis. 
                Get the inside scoop on some of the best timesaving techniques 
                from Chris Georgenes, somebody who knows all too well what "We need 
                it yesterday!" means. From character design and animation to motion 
                graphics techniques, Chris will teach you how to use Flash in ways 
                you never thought possible.
